description: Manage the item which is yet to be protected or backed up to an Azure Recovery services vault with an associated policy.

commands.name: az backup protectable-item initialize
commands.summary: Trigger the discovery of any unprotected items of the given workload type in the given container.
commands.syntax:
az backup protectable-item initialize --container-name
                                      --resource-group
                                      --vault-name
                                      --workload-type {MSSQL, SAPASE, SAPHANA, SAPHanaDatabase, SQLDataBase}
examples: az backup protectable-item initialize --resource-group MyResourceGroup --vault-name MyVault --workload-type MSSQL --container-name MyContainer

commands.name: az backup protectable-item list
commands.summary: Retrieve all protectable items within a certain container or across all registered containers.
commands.syntax:
az backup protectable-item list --resource-group
                                --vault-name
                                --workload-type {MSSQL, SAPASE, SAPHANA, SAPHanaDatabase, SQLDataBase}
                                [--backup-management-type {AzureIaasVM, AzureStorage, AzureWorkload}]
                                [--container-name]
                                [--protectable-item-type {HANAInstance, SAPHanaDatabase, SAPHanaSystem, SQLAG, SQLDatabase, SQLInstance}]
                                [--server-name]
examples: az backup protectable-item list --resource-group MyResourceGroup --vault-name MyVault --backup-management-type AzureWorkload --workload-type MSSQL --container-name MyContainer

commands.name: az backup protectable-item show
commands.summary: Retrieve the specified protectable item within the given container.
commands.syntax:
az backup protectable-item show --protectable-item-type {HANAInstance, SAPHanaDatabase, SAPHanaSystem, SQLAG, SQLDatabase, SQLInstance}
                                --server-name
                                --workload-type {MSSQL, SAPASE, SAPHANA, SAPHanaDatabase, SQLDataBase}
                                [--ids]
                                [--name]
                                [--resource-group]
                                [--subscription]
                                [--vault-name]
examples: az backup protectable-item show --resource-group MyResourceGroup --vault-name MyVault --workload-type MSSQL --protectable-item-type SQLAG --name Name  --server-name MyServerName
